35089690:
"Tranquil Setting",  Coffs Harbour
Our host Julie met us and our little dog with a friendly smile and showed us to our accommodation for the next three nights.
The setting was pleasingly quiet and calm. There was beautiful cookies, bread, milk and breakfast supplied in the indoor/outdoor kitchen which was well equipped. 
The floor plan was quirky with stairs to most rooms maybe  not for those not too sure on their feet. The stairs to the upstairs loft bedroom are very challenging but once up there the view over to the racecourse across the road was quite appealing. Fortunately we slept in the  big bed downstairs that was like sleeping on a cloud dressed with beautiful fresh linen.
The bathroom was painted in rainforest green and although the shower recess was a little tight the hot water flowed deliciously down our backs on the cool mornings.
The location was ideal being close to both the city hub and the harbour area.
All in all we enjoyed a very nice stay. 
Thankyou Julie.

137207001: Friendly host with welcoming touches for our arrival that made it extra special.
150492015: Staying at Lorraine's cottage was a pure delight. We instantly felt at home with the warm ambience that engulfed our stay. 2519973: Just loved staying at Lorraine's and look forward to visiting again when in Coffs. Her hospitality was exceptional and Lorraine went out of her way to make sure my stay was enjoyable. 68465126: Lorraine was an excellent hostess. The greeting was warm and friendly and the unit was all that you could need. I would recommend Lorraine’s unconditionally.
53872155:

60131252: Lorraine’s place is beautifully turned out and she is a lovely person. I can’t recommend the flat highly enough. Perfect for a stopover between Sydney and brizzy.
58085803: We absolutely loved our stay. The place is eclecticly styled. Very clean and relaxing. Lorraine was the most accommodating host. I wish I had more time there. But will definitely be back! 44823519: Lovely retro apartment. Lorraine made us really comfortable.
2901624: My fiancè, myself and our dog stayed at Lorraines place on our way up to Surfers. 62465648: It's a beautiful, spatious place with a lot of charm. Very clean and well equipped. The hosts are very friendly. We enjoyed our one night stay very much!
13579905: Lorraine is a sweet, free spirited and friendly, hard working soul.  We loved our chats on the veranda with her. 73118198: Lorraine's place was so beautiful and cozy. Nice amenities and easy to access. We spent a lovely night here. Highly recommended.
19868026: If you want a place to stay in Coffs, you won't need to look any further than this beautiful place
35251700: Lorraine's place was lovely and relaxing. Good amenities, clean, and easy to access. The snacks and provisions were greatly appreciated, and were a nice touch.
98496760: Warm, welcoming, cosy and inviting. A lovely place to stay. We will definitely stay at Lorainne's again. Beautiful.
54596434: I stayed at this airbnb for two nights with a friend and my partner. 99538138: Definitely back again! Accommodation was exactly as described and Lorraine was very welcoming. We stayed for one night, it was very homely and perfect for leaving our cat for a few hours whilst we ventured out for dinner. Thank you for everything :)
10040222: Lorraine is a wonderful hostess and her apartment is so homely and comfortable and decorated in such an interesting way to reflect Lorraine's interest and travels in Asia. 93543841: Lorraine is indeed a very great host. We have enjoyed staying at Lorraine’s place and her hospitality.
109993769: This AirBNB place is AMAZING!Lorraine is an awesome host! She is very friendly and considerate. We felt like at home! Next time we will definitely stay here longer! Actually this is the best AirBNB I've ever lived on in. I will definately recommend this fabulous place to all my friends! 这是我住过的最棒的airbnb｡Lorraine是个非常好客,细心的主人｡很高兴可以认识一个这样的朋友!屋子里的装饰很用心,每个小细节都很有特色｡很多装饰品都是主人从世界各地采购回来的｡最喜欢的是露台!天气好的早晨在那里吃早餐去真是棒极了!Lorraine准备了很多好吃的!多到吃不完!各种水果,茶点,还有Lorraine自己去烤制的饼干!一切都舒适极了,后悔只订了一晚,下次想多住几天!
38645121: Lorraine and her lovely guest apartment are the perfect stop off between Brisbane and Sydney! She is so kind, helpful and obliging. 119360860:
Brilliant place to stay even if it is just for the night. Lorraine make you feel so at home and welcomed, this is such a beautiful place to stay with a lovely verandah where you can enjoy breakfast and the beautiful sun.

21831645: We stayed here one night on our way down the coast. Accomodation matched the pictures. Was a cosy place to stay, with generous breakfast supplies which was very handy for us. Also a short drive to shops, restaurants and supermarket.
51197265: Sweet little one bedroom cottage at back of host's house separated by a verandah. Lots of interesting stuff. Only stayed one night on way from Brisbane to central coast, but had a lovely nap in the sunshine on the back verandah. Good for the soul.
135313722: Eclectic, period, characterful, spacious and private with a gracious host. Great location a stroll to shops foreshore or airport. A find.
11834201: Comfortable retro accommodation in central Coffs. Lorraine is a great host and obviously enjoys having guests and dogs there. Nice verandah and garden included as well as substantial breakfast and drinks. Comfy bed, lovely lounge and bathroom. Laundry facilities very welcome.
37451698:
Lorraine is a fantastic host, she really can't do enough for you, the location is fairly central although not really walkable, but Lorraine insisted on giving us a lift, the place itself has lots of interesting features and decor. 

I would happily recommend Lorraine to anyone.
8188383: Lorraine and her fabulous home are incredible! So clean, such amazing trinkets and decor, our cockatiels loved the place. 16351252: Very comfortable place to stay, Lorraine was very friendly and a very generous breakfast was included
11280153: I booked this gorgeous space at the last minute, due to a change in my travel dates. 125250175: Lorraine's Air BnB felt like a home away from home! Everything was so perfect from the comfy bed to the different jams in the little fridge! 130358096:
Enjoyed our stay and meeting such a lovely hostess 
Lorraine has thoughtfully provided everything you may need, including a lovely selection of herbal teas and a generous variety of choice for breakfast !
27258202: Lorraine's place is charming and has every possible home comfort. We stayed overnight on our journey north, but will certainly come back for a longer stay.
30610773: Lorraine really is a super host, with all the added extras and a very walm personal welcoming. My stay was so lovely and Lorraine was so accommodating.  I felt so spoilt. Will definitely recommend and go back.  The place was private and just a lovely space to be.
4934924: We stayed over the Easter weekend and enjoyed our stay very much. The location is central and close to shops and marina/foreshore. There are minor cooking facilities such as a gas camp cooker on the patio and a microwave and bar fridge. If ever passing through Coffs Harbour, we would recommend staying at Lorraine's.
47135831: A lovely comfortable place to stay with a great host. Highly recommended.
82539007: The host Lorraine is as beautiful and welcoming as the place she offers you! She left us complimentary breakfast and let us know that she was very available to help us in any way we needed. Highly recommend staying here - great location too.
1710243:
We had a fantastic stay at Lorraine's home. The separate guest room is nice and private, plus is well equipped with everything for your stay.

Lorraine is very helpful and friendly and will make sure you are having a great time.
84135225: Lorraine is a very welcoming host. The apartment is spacious and beautifully decorated with character. It was very close to shop and supermarket and a very short drive to different beaches. We will definitely stay here again the next time we visit Coffs Harbour.
55203788: Lovely lady, lovely spot highly recommended, clean, comfortable and beautiful
58672754: Fantastic value, five star host, charming decor and awesome balcony. Highly recommend
60255322:
Lorraine's was by far the coolest Airbnb we've ever stayed in. Her funky decor, awesome bed and spacious private area were exactly what we were looking for.
Her place is also centrally located but in a quiet spot, and is just around the corner from the little shopping mall and all the op shops :)
Don't hesitate, just book!
25919663: Ideal stop over in Coffs Harbour. Lorraine is a friendly generous host
68047230:
Lorraine's place was easy to find, in a central location in Coffs Harbour, in a residential area. Lorraine was able to allow us to check in early, and had provided food and snacks for our use. Her accommodation was clean and tidy, and very interesting to look around, with Asian, Indian and African furnishings, as well as old Australian items such as a Singer treadle sewing machine. 
Lorraine herself is a friendly, open person who makes her guests feel very welcome! I would certainly recommend her establishment to any travellers.
31953444:
HOME AWAY FROM HOME
Such a sunny, welcoming abode.
The host - in keeping with the theme of the accomodation - was sunny and warm.
Attention to detail was outstanding and generosity with food and drinks was such a treat. We were greeted with a friendly wave and fresh folded towels with fresh baked biscuits on the kitchen counter.
With the lodge separate from the family home we had the best of both worlds - privacy in a self contained unit with kitchen, bathroom, plenty of space AND the warm welcome from our gracious host.
115371103: I had a lovely overnight stay with Lorraine. The self-contained annex for her guests is gorgeous - full of character, colour, interesting things from her travels and little luxuries like homemade biscuits, every type of tea you could imagine, a new bar of soap for showering and plenty of towels. She was enormously kind, went out of her way to make sure I had everything I needed and provided all sorts of goodies for breakfast. There is a washing machine for guests to use and a line outside on the verandah for drying where you can also sit or laze if you want to be outside. A special and totally unique experience I'd have all over again!
36503379: A friend and I stopped at Lorraine's place on a drive from Sydney to Brisbane and it could not have been a better place to stay. The home is central to the beach and many restraunts. The room was tidy and well decorated and plenty of tea, coffee, breakfast and treats were provided! Lorraine was super friendly and really looked after us, we would recommend this place to anyone.
114888529: Great location. Friendly and polite service would recommend to friends
89452251: Lorraine was so welcoming and the space was beautifully decorated.  Bed was comfy. Thanks again!
68447815: Lorraine's place is great! Super homy and great amenities (including breakfast). She has really thought of everything required for a good night stay.
3841126: This was an excellent experience. The place was lovely, the location great and Lorraine truly deserves her status as a super host! I would recommend it to anyone.
92236824: Lorraine is a great host and provides excellent accomodation. The house is very comfortable, and Lorraine provides lots of delicious treats to make you feel welcome. It is very easy to walk into town from Lorraine's home, and the beach is also close by.
103512595:
Beautiful little vintage style area, amazing veranda with a beautiful view. Lorraine was a perfect host and full of knowledge about local hotspots. 
An A+ experience, we will definitely be back!
16636030: Lorraine was incredibly welcoming and kind! We felt right at home and cared for. The bed was super comfy and the shower was great. Lorraine's place is beautiful, her decor is unique and homely. We loved it!!
95610428: Lorraine was a great host - very friendly and welcoming. There were are a lot of little touches that made our stay very pleasant and a home away from home.
8962120: Lovely unit and great welcome from Lorraine ! Thank you and will come back with pleasure
78170531: We could not have been happier with our choice of stay in Coffs Harbour and Lorraine could not have been a nicer or more welcoming host. The rooms were comfortable and clean, in a good location and Lorraine generously provided breakfast for us, though we were more excited about the home-made anzac biscuits! Would stay here again anytime.
67862098: We absolutely loved staying with Lorraine, hands down the best airbnb we have ever visited! 28017173:
Lorraine's place was exactly as described. It was homely and quirky, gorgeous vintage light switches, handles on doors, picture rails, gave this place a lovely feel. 
Lorraine was very friendly and a great host. She provided extras, like breakfast, fruit, chocolates, tea etc, plus gave us a plate of home made biscuits. I would highly recommend staying here
99412264:
Very clean, very comfortable, thoughtful & practical breakfast snacks supplied in the fridge.
A perfect halfway stop between Sydney & Brisbane and pet-friendly too! A delightful little stop for a stay.
65002034:
Staying in this property was wonderful! Lorraine was friendly, accommodating and clearly enjoys being hospitable. The property was furnished with quirky antiques and was increidbly clean, but not sterile- the perfect place to retire to after a big day of work or play.

I plan on staying here again when ever possible, and encourage everyone else to do so as well.
60302798: Excellent host and Lorraine is extremely friendly. Also she provided all the snacks you need! The location is also great and very close to the shops and supermarket. Highly recommended!
86965863: Lorraines place suited us just fine .felt like home as soon as we walked in the door.Many food items were there to welcome us .Tastefully set out decor , much more than we expected . Lorraine was a very friendly host and went out of her way to help us.We will be back soon.
89387557: Thankyou Lorraine for a lovely stay. Loved the Lotus room!
51551844: Lorraine went above and beyond with making us feel welcome on our trip moving down to Sydney. We had everything we needed and some yummy extras for breakfast. Lorraine's place is lovely, unique and close to the centre of town. Thank you for making us and our pup feel very comfortable!
28261391:
Every detail was taken care of. We were very comfortable. The location was great as we were attending an event at the Coffs Harbour Regional Gallery. Very close and  easy access to shops and railway station.
Lorraine is a very caring host and delivers accommodation way beyond expectation !
75388354: What a gem of a find. Location is great, walking distance to the commercial centre of Coffs, golf course just around the corner. We had a tremendous stay and wholeheartedly recommend anyone looking for a relaxing place to stay in Coffs, consider this listing you won't be disappointed. We will be staying here again.
26610145: Our family was visiting Coffs for a wedding and really loved our stay at Lorraine's gorgeous accommodation, so full of charm and so many thoughtful touches, that it made our stay a special one.  Lorraine was very caring and always trying to help us out which made us feel like part of her family.  We loved having a chat with her on our relaxing deck one morning and really hope to repeat the experience in the future.  From the yummy breakfast provided to the abundant fluffy towels and blankets - we could have stayed for much longer. Thanks Lorraine!
32411634: What a great place to stay! Lorraine was a fantastic host and the space was amazing, so quirky and comfortable. We were only here for one night on the way down the coast but I would have loved to stay for more.
71006560:
Lorraine's house is great place to stay - very relaxing and quiet. Big veranda   is sunny in the morning for breakfast and pleasant shadow for lunch and dinner. Great location - 5 minutes to all places in town (even if town is actually very small :) ) . 

Also it is very stylish with all that decorations and old style things!

Like it very much!

Thank you, Lorraine!

Serge and Mishka
65857899:
Wow - what a quirky, fascinating place to stay. Very comfortable and spacious with an covered verandah and a BBQ.  Very generous provisions and some extra treats (Caramello Koalas) as well.
We just loved our stay here and will come back and use Lorraine's place as a base to explore more of the earea
93576172: A great spot. Lorraine was very helpful and friendly and the house has a wonderful feel.
2986334: Lorraine provided us a beautiful calm and so very comfortable space.  She is a gracious and friendly host and we could not ask for anything more .
4222187: We stayed at Lorraine's place for one night, with our two girls (1 and 4 yrs old). We had a wonderful stay: Lorraine is an amazing host, very nice and hospitable. 87681796: Lorraine is a great, lovely host who made us feel very welcoming. The place has character, it's clean and comfortable.  It's my first experience with Airbnb and it's a good one.  I would definitely stay with Lorraine again.
26643221: Lorraine is a most obliging and friendly host who puts 100% effort into making your stay a happy one. She successfully makes everything warm, cosy and relaxing. 29273561: Decorated by a fellow traveller, this accommodation was spacious with an exceptionally catered for breakfast. The adjacent deck will not disappoint!
9414043: My son and I stayed overnight in Coffs Harbour at Lorraine's after spending the day at a soccer carnival nearby. We arrived at Lorraine's cold and worn out. 35760068: Lorraine was AMAZING right from the booking until the moment we left! She kept in touch with us in the lead up to our trip and was very welcoming when we arrived. Everything we could possibly need was there and Lorraine was a fantastic host, I couldn't recommend her place anymore and I can't wait to return there and enjoy it again one day!
13212408: Lorraine is great very friendly. Thought it was a bit expensive for what it was. The sofa bed was really lumpy and the camp style kitchen not ideal in winter. Good for a couple not great for a family of 4.
27039717: We enjoyed staying at Lorraine's place and she was very friendly and welcoming.  The balcony and rooms are spacious and the bed was huge and very comfortable. 56262432: Lorraine was very welcoming and did all she could to make us feel comfortable
70387525: Lorraine is a delight and does all she can to make you welcome and your stay as comfortable as possible. The accommodation was warm and inviting: fresh flowers and fruit, a wonderful range of teas, a choice of breakfast supplies, all made it very easy to slip into the wonderful holiday experience. For the short period of time we stayed it felt like home. The location for us was ideal being close to the beautiful botanic gardens, Coles and the highway for the exploring Coffs surrounds. I would definitely stay again and recommend to any friends.
4899004: Lorraine is a welcoming and thoughtful host. Her home is well-appointed, comfortable and beautifully clean. Lorraine's generous snacks and breakfast goodies are also fantastic. Communication around our booking and arrival was easy and Lorraine gave excellent directions to assist with our arrival and parking arrangement. I highly recommend Lorraine as a great host and would definately stay again in the future.
29307590: Lorraine's guest flat was lovingly maintained, well-presented and in a most convenient location.  Particular highlights were the heritage architecture and the sunny verandah.  Lorraine is a very welcoming and thoughtful host, and went above and beyond to ensure that I had a good experience.
53062486: I have never been greeted so warmly or had such good care taken of me. Lorraine is a warm and wonderful person who supplied absolutely everything we could have needed and more. The apartment is very comfortable and we decided to not go anywhere during the day but just enjoyed the peace and comforts and had a relaxing day. We can't wait to be back in a fortnight.
49980757: Lorraine made us feel very welcome and greeted us at the door. We had a lovely, short stay at Coffs Harbour. Her space is lovely and has wonderful furnishings and decor.
33463464: Awesome stay at Lorraine's Airbnb. We absolutely loved her place and would definitely book again, we were very well looked after and really wished we could have stayed longer. Thank you so much for your hospitality. Wendy & Tim :)
65496871: Lorraine made us feel very welcome and was there when we arrived and showed us around. She had provided lots of treats for us and was able to give us information and maps to help us enjoy the area. We enjoyed staying in her comfortable home and found the area wonderful to walk around as well as drive around. We had our honey moon there 43 years ago, and so much had changed since then. Still a beautiful place.
65309829: Lorraine made me feel so welcome, I loved the 'Welcome' blackboard. The accommodation surpassed the description. It is absolutely beautiful in federation style with a touch of the orient. Loved the vibe!
6620043:
Lorraine is absolutely lovely, and her warmth is only surpassed by the beauty and vintage elegance of the guest accommodation. 
The charming space was decorated with antiques and careful consideration, and myself and my partner and our 6 month old Staffy pup were more than comfortable with our surrounds. The only disappointment was that we arrived very late and left early the next morning. But this accommodation alone has inspired us to return to Coffs and stay again whenever possible.
28710826: Lovely place to stay and relax for overnight break from long haul driving. Very clean.
40166109: Lorraine is a very very nice host and we absolutely enjoyed our stay there.
65158711: The property was exactly as I expected.  Warm and inviting. So much space, excellent value for money and really well set up.  I sat in the light of the window and did some work and Lorraine was happy for me to have my friend for a glass of wine as I had traveled so far to see her.  Lorraine made sure my favourites like Peppermint tea were all there ready and waiting for me and when I needed something she jumped to make that happen.  It really was wonderful.
13806291:
Lovely, friendly and welcoming hostess, beautifully decorated and comfortable appartment. The back deck was perfect for breakfast after a refreshing walk.
Clear directions and great local knowledge.
Would highly recommend and hope to visit again at some t in me in the future, thank you Lorraine.
11501087:
Lorraine was really easy to communicate with, and quick to respond to any queries.

Lorraine offers a stay in a completely separate part of the house. There is a very comfortable king size bed in the bedroom, and plenty of space to sit in the sitting room or out on the verandah.  The large bathroom has a great shower, and houses the laundry.

We were offered a wide choice for breakfast.  Crumpets, butter and jam, fresh fruit, yoghurt and muesli.  We prepared this is our own area and ate outside.

Lorraine is close to the centre of town, where we had dinner.

We recommend Lorraine's place for great value for money, location, cleanliness - it was just what we needed.
61858759:
The neighbourhood is normal residential in an elevated part of Coffs Harbour, close to the  CBD, and a five minute drive to the beach.
It is on the corner of two streets with space around the property.
Aspect is good as the lovely veranda catches the summer breezes and winter sun.
24045790:
The accommodation was lovely & comfortable. It was as described & more. 
Lorraine kindly helped unpack the car of gear & dogs.
Having breakfast & dinner on the back deck was a pleasure.  Lorraine is a great host, we were treated to dessert on our first evening.
It is rare to find accommodation which has the option of leaving dogs unsupervised. Was initially hesitant in leaving them in the kennel, for fear that they might fret.  Lorraine kindly offered to watch over them when she was in & gave them treats & out of kennel time.  They were left for an extended period on their first day.   Lorraine not only settled them in, she also messaged me to put my mind at ease. Thanks Lorraine for your thoughtfulness.
Was lovely to find a home away from home for the 5 night stay. We will be back when in Coffs.
44987971:
I am so glad I chose Lorraine's property! She was so easy and helpful to deal with before my stay had even begun, especially when I wanted to add an extra night. 
Lorraine's house is beautiful! The decorations are stunning; it is a very unique and special property. We loved sitting on the verandah and the king size bed is so comfortable. 
The real jewel is Lorraine. She is so friendly and was a joy to meet. She was generous with a delicious selection of food and teas plus with her time. She picked us up after a trip to the beach and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was delightful. 
Highly recommended!
59098408: This was an excellent stay.  Lorraine was a delightful host who went out of her way to make our stay special.
60862284:
Lorraine is about the kindest, sweetest, and most thoughtful person you're going to meet. She is really lovely and that's reflected in the accommodation. The rooms are clean, well ordered, well equipped, and uniquely styled. 

I thoroughly enjoyed everything about my stay, including my chats with Lorraine. She's unintrusive and gives you your privacy, but when I asked her to join me for tea and a chat she was interesting and sweet. I just can't speak highly enough of her and the accommodation. 100% satisfied with everything and I'll definitely return.
8949356: Received such a warm welcome from Lorraine, she is a lovely, friendly host. We quickly settled in & went off exploring. Lorraine's love of Asian travelling is evident in her furnishings. We had lots of space to spread out & the bed was lovely. Her breakfast provisions were excellent. Didn't need aircon as the breeze wafted through the windows at night. Excellent value . Would definitely stay with Lorraine again.
59244378: Kim and I enjoyed a wonderful experience with our short stay at Lorraine's home, it was over and above what we had expected. Lorraine had provided not only a bed for the night but a completely self contained flat with it's own bedroom, well furnished lounge room and private bathroom a real home away from home, spotlessly clean and welcoming. Lorraine as a hostess is wonderful, such a natural warm welcoming personality, you may arrive as a stranger but you will leave feeling as a part of her family and her as a part of yours. Thank you Lorraine for a wonderful stay and you are a credit to Airbnb, once word spreads about your hospitality you will number 1 choice for Coffs Harbour.
39329485: Lorraine made our family feel so welcome. The accommodation felt very much like our home, cleaned and tidy.  Thank you, Lorraine for making our stay in Coffs Harbour very memorable and enjoyable, your great local knowledge was very informative and we look forward to staying there again when we next visit.
37555365: All things are perfect. This is an old but well maintained house. When you walk into the rooms, you will find yourself in an elegant museum (according to my friends who I shared pictures with). Another feature of this place is its LARGE size, it is enough for 2 or 3 people to live in, here you will have one big-sized bedroom, one private bathroom, one living room and one balcony as well. Guests' place is more like a separate unit in a house. In addition, if you are a traveller from China or interested in Chinese culture, this old fashioned comforts won't regret you. There are so many Chinese elements decorating the house. When I walked in the living room, pictorials of old Shanghai style ladies really surprised me. This kind of pictorial is precious and difficult to acquire even in China. If I have a chance to visit Coffs Harbour again, I will definitely stay here and talk with the kind lady and her family.
9762176: Lorraine went above and beyond. She was easy to contact and very flexible. The room was set out beautifully, there is also a living, dining and private bathroom available. 147116004: What to say about my stay at Lorraine's?  The home was beautiful, charming, incredibly decorated, spacious (huge), and very convenient to everything around Coff's. 70996496: Lorraine was the most attentive, kind, caring and interesting host we've met so far. 118448080: Great Spot, Awesome host, You wont be disappointed!

My Mom and I stayed at Lorraine's flat for just one night during a month long caravan trip in Australia. The bathroom is beautifully restored to its heritage original with a great shower and old school English style loo.  The back veranda was sunny and lovely to relax on during the day. It kind of feels like you are staying in beautiful period museum at Lorraine's place.

Lorraine was the nicest host we've had on our Australian travels (they have all been fantastic though so though she has some great competition). I say this because of how accommodating she was to us and made us feel like we were part of the family. We checked in late but she arrived shortly after (she was out of town when we booked) to make up the hideaway bed and bring some breakfast goodies. Then we had to deal with some problems with out van, she let us hang out on the back veranda most of the day until we had our troubles sorted out. She even fed us lunch and joined us to chat about life and such. 

She was such a gracious host and her place had so much character I would love to stay again at Lorraine's place. In fact we would have done so but it booked up before we could confirm our plans. I highly recommend this bnb.
90104339: Lorraine's house is absolutely beautiful and she couldn't have been more welcoming. She laid out a feast for breakfast in the morning and gave us some useful tips for where to visit in the area. Also a very comfy sofa bed!

63617189:

91900461:

53995828: Lorraine's place was great! It was clean, comfortable and, Lorraine was lovely. She greeted us on arrival and made sure we got settled in, provided a brilliant continental breakfast and, left us wanting for nothing else. Would definitely stay with Lorraine again.

72309818: Mum.... I mean Lorraine and her property were beyond AMAZING, exceeded all expectations!! Easily one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had. 41731917:

21151242: If only I could leave 100 stars for Lorraine! Amazing place, very clean and spacious at a very reasonable price with artfully curated furniture and decor. 11256678:
Staying with Lorraine was one of our best AirBnB experiences.  Well equipped apartment. Killer bed. Good bathroom. Great kitchen (BBQ).

9203725:
My 1 night stay after Touch Rugby World Cup in Coffs Harbour turned a very memorable one. There are so much beautiful things that I can write about. Where shall I start.... :) 

Lorraine and Emma (Daughter) was very kind and wholehearted to make sure your stay is supported by all means that they can offer.  Lorraine prepares a nice house and clean on-suite bed room with very spacious and clean shower & toilet area, which I really felt comfortable/pleasant using it. I felt very welcomed to the house and sense of protection by the set-up created in tranquil, green and clean environment. 

The location is actually nice walking distance from the beach for a healthy adults, although  Lorraine  would offer a ride and pick-up to/from the beach whenever she is available. Airport pickup/drop-off is extremely helpful especially if you do not have the idea of map/directions of the town with heavy luggage. Also Lorraine cooked Tofu-stir fry which I really enjoyed. 

They kindly keep basic but more than sufficient food and drinks in the guests fridge and tea coffee section had a lot of options for tea lovers.  

Before I forget, I really appreciate Emma taking me for a walk  in the Mutton bird Island for a walk with her 2 of the dogs. I was very happy that I was given this opportunity to see the mutton bird and also hearing some crickets singing at the sunset time and full moon coming up in the sky. 

 I enjoyed listening to the family history of Selmer's and how she ended up there! It really gave me some interesting insight how Australia established itself in the recent history. 

When I travel alone it does not get this much personal but we talked a lot at night with some wine. I felt I was integrated into the life of Selmer's. I must admit I must admit it was the top home stay I have ever had. I felt both were really sincere and try to give as much as they have in the given condition. 

I would certainly like to give more than 5 star to this listing! :D
23874903: Lorraine was very welcoming and made us feel right at home. My friends and I had total privacy, since the living area is separate from the main house. I would definitely recommend Lorraine's place to all. :)

She really deserves the title superhost and we highly recommend to stay at her place.

23174162: great value if you're only staying for 1 or 2 nights, but due to lack of wi fi, no air con & not having all the appliances one would expect in a kitchen, i wouldn't recommend it for long term bookings, if those things bother u. otherwise it's really good if you're not bothered by those lacking things. on the positive, the space is very good & the beds are very comfy, and i love the rain shower...i would definitely recommend staying here if you need 2 bedrooms & you're only staying for 1 or 2 nights. longer stays are ok if you're not bothered by not having any wi fi, air con in summer or winter time, otherwise it's fine during autumn or spring. price wise, it's good value either way, but i do expect a decent wi fi connection & we had no connection at all, which is ok for 1 night, but not if you are staying for a full wk. i havn't had issues with internet in other places in small country towns, so I'm guessing it can be fixed. i always highly recommend airbnb host to install aircon for winter & summer, it's a small cost & can always be made up with airbnb guest using the place more often. it's nice to have a warm area during winter & a cooler area in summer, as our summers are getting hotter & hotter. i think $1500 is a small investment, to keep guest happy & comfy. Anthony is a really nice guy & easy to communicate with. i like to keep my reviews accurate & honest, because there is a lack of it on airbnb & more people need to review both good qualities & the negative qualities. otherwise some guest just get disappointed, having high expectations based on recent reviews, only to find that the reviews didn't mention any of the negative qualities, and for some guest the negative qualities are not an issue, but for others it is. so i encourage guest to be fair in reviews, but most importantly to be truthful.

130117029:
A comfortable and relatively fuss-free stay. Although we sadly didn't get a chance to meet him, Haddy comes across as an experienced and thoughtful host via his communications which made our experience all the better.

As acknowledged by the host and other reviewers, Haddy and Fran's place is near the highway and has stairs, which can be a bit daunting but proved managable. There is also quite dense vegetation which, combined with the warmer climate, resulted in a great host of mosquitoes greeting us on arrival (but the downsides stop there).

Haddy had thoughtfully prepared the place for our arrival so it was a relief on escaping the mosquitoes to enter the house and be greeted with the coolness of the aircon.  We were impressed with the smart kitchen and having the upper floor to ourselves felt like a luxury. There was a good selection of breakfast and even dinner foods available which was much appreciated as we were not inclined to go out for dinner. The bed was comfortable and despite the noise from the highway, when you're tired you don't care about background noise all that much. The hot water system was a bit fiddly - I could achieve either slightly scalding or chilly but sadly not Goldilocks temperature, but I did (hopefully) achieve the goal of a relatively short shower! Overall, a pleasant stay which I would recommend =)

4408983: I mistakenly booked the wrong date however, Geoff was able to accommodate me in an alternative suite so on this occasion, I did not stay in the studio so my review is not for it.  Geoff welcomed me warmly to his modern property which was nestled amongst a playful, colourful garden.  Were the weather a little different, I could have been in the tropics!  The accommodation I stayed in was very private, spacious and decorated in the French Provincial style, it was light and rather sumptuous.  There was a lovely timber deck which unfortunately I did not get to enjoy given that I only stayed for one night. That was my only regret about staying here however!  The accommodation was 2 blocks from Orlando Street and The Jetty and one block from "Supply," a cafe serving pretty good coffee.  The location was really handy to everything, restaurants, shopping village and lots of paths for walking/running.  This place was modern, clean and thoughtfully provisioned, parking literally right at the door and quiet. I will be coming to Coffs for work off and on and I hope to be able to stay at Geoff and Sue's again.
6340623:
After a long night of driving through torrential rain Geoff greeted me after dark with a friendly beacon of light to my destination, and with a warm welcoming smile he showed me to my private suite.

Well presented, the suite is super clean and modern, a great change from the tired 70's motels scattered across the country.  The property is set back from the quiet street so there's no chance of being woken early, but alas, if you want a nice simple continental breakfast which is included in the price; it's served between 7:30-8:30am which is quite reasonable in my books.

The bed is 5 star hotel quality and has a fan above for those hotter months.  Although air conditioning would beckon in summer periods, something to consider.  Bathroom was well equipped...I love the shower head...great water flow unlike some of those water saver heads that jet thin spurts of water.

I'd seriously highly recommend Sue and Geoff's place :)

Regards
Terence.

There is an interior door (locked on thier side and lockable from studio side) that leads to thier own home. Thier general living area seems to be above the studio and the door that is connected, is a bottom floor utility room or entry way to thier home?. Either way, you can hear the owners upstairs and also they were active and making some noise (talking etc) in the adjoining room, at around 8am, which woke me up.  There was some snoring during the night and general activities in the morning that could bother some guests, who are looking for quiet. Our stay at Pip's amazing tree-top home was even better than we could have imagined! The house is in a quiet residential area and backs up onto a lovely garden and a dense wooded reserve, with plenty of birds and wildlife to watch from the balcony. We loved the space so much, we decided to eat in so we could soak up the quiet vibe and enjoy the views before hitting the road again in the morning. We enjoyed our stay in Coffs at Annelies's Jetty Guesthouse. Not knowing Coffs Harbour at all we found we were very central, and in walking distance to the Jetty strip of restaurants (and the jetty/harbour) and also the river.
The house was so well set up for us...don't worry about the walk down to the house in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was easy to do, we just drove our car through the automatic opening road gate, parked in front of the small pedestrian gate, walked through it and down the shady path to the property. The location of the house gives you lovely peaceful views (and a few sheep "baas"). We travelled with our dog, who was very well accommodated (fully fenced yard) and she enjoyed sitting on the balcony looking out (and probably catching those breezes). Very comfortable queen bed, and two singles in the other room for our kids.  Nice neat living area with everything you need and more (one of the fanciest coffee machines I have seen in an Airbnb). The nicest touch was very generous breakfast provisions, and so much fruit. Would definitely stay here again...once I have invented another excuse to holiday in Coffs Harbour.
